product_name: Brooks Infiniti C/D Sports Bra - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Brooks Infiniti C/D Sports Bra offers full support without bulk or unnecessary weight, and stays snug when you're running or doing other high-impact activities. Combination of compression and encapsulation support provides a secure fit that hugs without being uncomfortable. Elastic chest band features soft, ribbed fabric that manages moisture and won't irritate skin. Adjustable racer-back straps let you personalize your fit. Seam-free, shaped cups inside the Brooks Infiniti C/D Sports Bra provide subtle lift and contouring. Mesh panels and inner liner wick moisture away from the skin, ensuring you stay dry and comfortable even when working up a sweat. Closeout.
short_description: The Brooks Infiniti C/D Sports Bra offers full support without bulk or unnecessary weight, and stays snug when you're running or doing other high-impact activities.
